inclusion.criterion: Currently on Evening Insulin Glargine prescribed by Primary Care Physician
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to Communicate Clearly over the Phone
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pre-screened by Anesthesia Department > 48 hours prior to Surgery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: On Insulin Glargine Dual Dosing or Sliding Scale Regimen
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes confirmed with molecular analysis and is being treated with ACE inhibitors, Beta blockers, and insulin. He does not have any other significant medical issues or family history of concern.
